remarks: A group operation is a left group action of the group on itself. (Contributed by FL, 17-May-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
gaid2.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gaid2.2 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gaid2.3 $e |- F = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x .+ y ) ) $.
gaid2 $p |- ( G e. Grp -> F e. ( G GrpAct X ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
